subject: Re: Re: AliExpress orders：3058168425140616 Provide VAT
description_text:
This makes no sense but then,  will I get a refund when the item is
returned to you?

El vie, 22 ago 2025, 3:43, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
escribió:

> UPS response: We have forwarded your information to our colleagues at the
> destination. The phone number you provided is the same as the original one,
> and we were unable to reach them at the time. Please provide alternative
> contact information or an email address, or urge the recipient to contact
> local authorities for instructions.
> Due to the lack of timely response, the product will be returned or
> destroyed, and a refund will be issued upon confirmation.
>
> ------------------------------
> service@simsonn.com
>
>
> *发件人：* Aagsar <aagsar@gmail.com>
> *发送时间：* 2025-08-12 18:07
> *收件人：* General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
> *主题：* Re: AliExpress orders：3058168425140616 Provide VAT
>
> Sorry there was a mistake in the VAT number. The right one is :
>
> ES72039389P
>
> El mar, 12 ago 2025, 11:06, Aagsar <aagsar@gmail.com> escribió:
>
>> Aaron Garcia Saranga
>> VAT : ES72039489P
>> +34638104797
>>
>> El mar, 12 ago 2025, 3:24, General and sales enquiries <
>> service@simsonn.com> escribió:
>>
>>>
>>> Hello, this is the official SIMSONN store. Regarding your AliExpress
>>> order 3058168425140616, UPS Global Express: 1ZJ455510438481243, we need you
>>> to provide your importer tax number and valid contact information to assist
>>> with customs clearance. The Spanish VAT local tax number is generally
>>> composed of N+numbers+English letters. Please reply to the email within
>>> three days to avoid product loss.
>>> ------------------------------
>>> service@simsonn.com
